<company>
    <name>Frank, Austin and Harris</name>
    <background>
      Frank, Austin and Harris is a leading law firm specializing in innovative legal solutions. Our team is committed to excellence, integrity, and providing the highest quality service to our clients.
    </background>
  </company>
  <position>
    <title>Software Developer</title>
    <type>Full-Time</type>
    <location>Remote</location>
    <description>
      Frank, Austin and Harris is seeking an experienced software developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be self-motivated and possess strong problem-solving skills. He will work closely with our development team to create and maintain software solutions that meet our clients' needs.
    </description>
  </position>
  <responsibilities>
    <item>Develop and maintain software applications.</item>
    <item>Collaborate with team members to define project specifications and timelines.</item>
    <item>Write clean, scalable code using programming languages such as Java and Python.</item>
    <item>Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to standards.</item>
    <item>Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade software applications.</item>
  </responsibilities>
  <qualifications>
    <item>Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.</item>
    <item>Strong proficiency in Java, Python, and other programming languages.</item>
    <item>Experience with software development tools and methodologies.</item>
    <item>Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.</item>
    <item>Ability to work independently and within a team environment.</item>
    <item>Minimum of 3 years of experience in software development.</item>
  </qualifications>
  <benefits>
    <item>We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from £50,000 to £70,000 annually, based on your experience and skills.</item>
    <item>Comprehensive health insurance plans.</item>
    <item>Flexible working hours and remote work options.</item>
    <item>Professional development opportunities.</item>
    <item>Generous vacation and PTO policy.</item>
  </benefits>
